meanings.definition: Extremely realistic or lifelike in appearance or effect.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarealistic painting of the ocean made it seem like you could jump in and swim.
meanings.sent2: The movie used ultrarealistic special effects to make the dinosaurs look alive.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealistic statue of a giant banana peel confused visitors who thought it was real.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrarealistic dream of flying without wings felt like a magical adventure.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealistic details in the virtual reality game transported players to another world.

meanings.definition: Resembling or simulating reality to an extremely high degree.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarealistic video game graphics made it hard to distinguish from real life.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarealistic wax figure of the celebrity looked almost identical to the actual person.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealistic robot vacuum cleaner kept bumping into walls, thinking they were real obstacles.
meanings.sent4: His ultrarealistic acting in the play brought tears to the audience's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealistic sound effects in the horror movie made viewers jump in their seats.
